title: Share Assets
description: How to share assets with team members or external users
steps: Log in to the Brandworkz platform using your credentials
Select the asset(s) you want to share by checking the boxes next to them
Click on the 'Share' button in the top menu
Choose between sharing via email, generating a link, or adding to a shared collection
Set expiration date and permissions for the shared assets if applicable
Add a message for the recipients if sharing via email
Click 'Send' or 'Generate Link' to complete the sharing process
